title: Orange health bar and Blue right click HOW do you do that help!!!
body: Hey guys i ve seen even many youtubers have done this they have instead of green healthbars displaying above their mana or energy they have a orange coloured one and also their right click isnt green its blue how do you do this as it kinda looks cool and i want to do it for my self

replies.body: Those youtubers might have had colorblind mode turned on. It's an option you can find within the in-game settings which will change the color of some elements to make them easier to see.
